newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin up five cents up to 14.52 rgt/kg on LME.
newsitem.headline: KL tin up five cents up to 14.52 rgt/kg on LME.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price ended up five cents to 14.52 ringgit ($5.86) a kg, following a higher London Metal Exchange (LME) overnight, traders said.
"The LME went up and although there were higher offerings here, there was also some good demand," said a trader.
Traders noted initial bids for 224 tonnes against offers for 165. Final turnover was 185 tonnes, against 137 on Thursday, and was absorbed by European, Japanese and local interests.
Traders said the local price was at a discount of $30 against the LME, compared to a premium of $15 previously.
